content.body: Just to highlight for browsers, there is a bug in `sv` data loading in ICU 74.1 which will affect web compat. THe bug is fixed, I think, in 74.2. See https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/ICU-22575, https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1864612
content.formatted_body: Just to highlight for browsers, there is a bug in sv data loading in ICU 74.1 which will affect web compat. THe bug is fixed, I think, in 74.2. See https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/ICU-22575, https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1864612
